post_message: Noor, a 14-year-old girl from a small village in northern Iraq, was sold 15 times, passed from one Islamic State fighter to the next. Each time, she was raped. Noor managed to escape and made her way, mostly on foot, to a refugee camp. “The worst moments,” Noor said, “were when one man would sell me to another. And I would have to hear them debating what my life was worth.”
